TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ControlBindingsCollection extends System.Windows.Forms.BindingsCollection

summary.span: 代表控件的数据绑定的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of data bindings for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 简单的数据绑定是通过将 对象添加到 来实现的。Simple data binding is accomplished by adding objects to a . 从 类继承的任何对象都可以通过 属性访问 。Any object that inherits from the class can access the through the property. 有关支持数据绑定的 Windows 控件的列表，请参阅 类。For a list of Windows controls that support data binding, see the class. 包含 、和 等标准收集方法。The contains standard collection methods such as , , and . 若要获取 所属的控件，请使用 属性。To get the control that the belongs to, use the property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将 对象添加到五个控件的 ：四个 控件和一个 控件。The following code example adds objects to a of five controls: four controls and a control. 通过 类的 属性来访问 。The is accessed through the property of the class. [!code-cpp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Classic ControlBindingsCollection Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
